title: Hiss: Deadly Creatures Pack 2
description: “Serpentine Soundscapes - The Hiss of Adventure Awaits!”
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Unleash the hiss of danger with “Hiss: Deadly Creatures Pack 2,” a passionately created sound effects pack designed for the bold and adventurous game developer. This collection features an array of serpent and snake hiss sounds, from the subtlest short hiss to the most prolonged and ominous longest hiss. Each sound is available in both dry and reverbed versions, providing the flexibility to match any environment within your game’s world.


Whether you’re creating a dense jungle atmosphere where a hidden danger lurks in every shadow or a desolate desert scene punctuated by the threat of slithering foes, this pack delivers. The dry versions offer crisp, clean sounds perfect for outdoor scenes, while the reverbed versions add an eerie depth, ideal for dungeons or enclosed spaces.


Game developers will find these sounds perfect for:


Ambient background to build tension

Character interactions, such as when players encounter venomous creatures

Audio triggers during stealth sequences

Environmental hazards in puzzle-solving scenarios

Cinematic cutscenes to heighten drama

Files are conveniently named “Hiss” followed by their duration (short, median, longer, and longest), allowing for quick and easy integration into your audio workflow. With “Hiss: Deadly Creatures Pack 2,” your players’ spines will tingle with the anticipation of danger, making every moment in your game an epic adventure.
technicalDetails:
Features

Included folders are:

Dry_Hiss

Reverbed_Hiss


Number of Audio Waves: 254

Number of Audio Cues: 254

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 17:19

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
